Map Info
Welcome to HandiMap!

This is a work in progress project created by BBY-17 with the goal of creating an interactive map of BCIT campuses for people with accessibility needs to find their way around campus and find reviews about their classroom's accessibility.

How to operate (Mobile):
  • Pan the camera by moving your fingers across the screen
  • Zoom in/out by pinching/separating your fingers on the screen
  • Edit map settings from the hamburger menu > settings > map settings
  • View reviews from a classroom on the map by tapping its marker (must have markers enabled)

Future plans:
  • Mapped elevator locations with reviews
  • Routes that connect classrooms to each other
  • More floors and buildings (including DTC)
